title: Computer Graphics Special
creator_credit: Steve Michelson, Geoffrey de Valois and Donna Cohen
brief_description: Journey to the unknown as this thoroughly entertaining program takes you on a behind the scenes journey into the exciting world of computer graphics and animation. Travel from inside the body to outer space; as the worlds of fantasy and reality explode in a colour and intensity never seen before.
creator_credit_for_label: Steve Michelson, Geoffrey de Valois and Donna Cohen
